content.content: MIP41c5-SP15: Facilitator Offboarding - Derek (PECU-001)  Preamble MIP41c5-SP#: 15 Author(s): @Derek Contributors: Tags: cu-facilitator, pe-001, mip Status: RFC Date Proposed: 2022-02-08 Date Ratified:  Forum URL: https://forum.makerdao.com/t/mip41c5-sp15-facilitator-offboarding-derek-pecu-001/19749 Ratification Poll URL:   Sentence Summary MIP41c5-SP15 voluntarily offboards @Derek as Facilitator of the Protocol Engineering Core Unit (PECU-001) - (to be replaced by an LLC business entity).  Paragraph Summary MIP41c5-SP15 voluntarily offboards @Derek as Facilitator of the PE Core Unit (PECU-001). If MIP41c4-SP42 passes, the facilitation of the Protocol Engineering-Core-Unit will be handed over to Prototech Labs, an LLC represented by @Derek.  Specification  Motivation This MIP formalises my business entity as the core unit facilitator. It seeks to correct a governance/management oversight and does not change any pre-existing responsibilities or duties of the Protocol Engineering Core Unit. Core Unit ID PECU-001
content.GPT-summary: The post is a proposal (MIP41c5-SP15) that explains the voluntary offboarding of @Derek as Facilitator of the Protocol Engineering Core Unit (PECU-001) and the handover of facilitation to Prototech Labs, an LLC represented by @Derek. The proposal seeks to formalize the LLC as the core unit facilitator and correct a governance/management oversight. The post does not contain any advertising or entirely positive/negative feedback on the proposal. However, it may be open to constructive criticism, collaboration, and questions.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
3rd party or author wants to collaborate on proposal

content.content: This is a summary of the potential impact of this proposal, from GovAlpha’s perspective:  This is a valid Facilitator offboarding subproposal under the currently approved governance process. This MIP offboards @Derek as facilitator of the Risk Core Unit. This is a voluntary offboarding. Since it is a voluntary offboarding, it will not be voted on. This MIP has been made in conjunction with MIP41c4-SP42 which onboards new facilitator(s). This proposal has been assigned High-Impact based on the methodology listed here.  Disclaimer: These summaries are intended to be a guide and not a source of truth. You remain responsible for any actions you take on the grounds of this information. Please note the date when the summary was last updated to judge accuracy. Updated 2023-02-14
